post.content_html:
That's all, folks. The 4th and final week of our Halloween event has come to an end, check it out!

100k Competition

This week's competition had big names, all racing for the final pot. However, Casey collected over 169,000 candies on his way to level 100, leaving everyone else behind üí®. Congratulations to all the top 10 winners and to the users that reached level 100 during this competition!

In-game event

Hosted by Lars, we watched 3 games where our staff played vs the CSGORoll users. The winners of each match would take home a Shadow Dagger | Slaughter (Factory New). After several events, our staff has finally reached a good skill level leading to good games! Check out the results below:

Game 1:

Game 2:

Game 3:

Thank you for participating in this event, we hope you enjoyed it as much as we did and had the chance to participate, even if a little, in everything that we prepared during this Halloween for you. This is the end of our Halloween event, but rest assured that more will come and we hope to see you soon!

Missed the stream? Don't worry. You can still watch the full video HERE .
